    Method new()

    Usage

    biva$new(
  data,
  y,
  d,
  z,
  x_ymodel,
  x_smodel,
  y_type = "real",
  ER = 1,
  side = 2,
  beta_mean_ymodel,
  beta_sd_ymodel,
  beta_mean_smodel,
  beta_sd_smodel,
  sigma_shape_ymodel,
  sigma_scale_ymodel,
  seed = 1997,
  fit = TRUE,
  ...
)

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    biva$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.
